text: Kroger is a retail supermarket chain in the United States. As of 2010, it had 3,619 stores. Bernard Kroger opened the first Kroger store in 1883 in Cincinnati, Ohio. The company's headquarters are still in Cincinnati today. In 1999, the company merged with Fred Meyer, Inc. ==References== Category:Supermarkets of the United States Category:Cincinnati Category:1883 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Ohio Category:Companies based in Ohio
title: Kroger
